document.full_text: at least three civilians were killed on monday when security forces entered the town of talbiseh in central syria to crush dissent against president bashar al-assad, a rights group said.
document.title: three killed as army enters central syrian town
lines_and_colors: at least three civilians were killed on monday when security forces entered the town of talbiseh in central syria to crush dissent against president bashar al-assad, a rights group said.
